languages.text: "Через эту дверь". {n}Арджента кивает на проход справа от вас.{/n} "Я пойду с вами, ибо долг мой перед Богом-Императором — уничтожить эту ересь".

traits.locale_text: "Через эту дверь". {n}Арджента кивает на проход справа от вас.{/n} "Я пойду с вами. Не терпится уничтожить тех, кто посягнул на владения Бога-Императора!"

languages.text: "Through this door." {n}Argenta nods at the passage to your right.{/n} "I shall join you, for it is my duty to the God-Emperor to destroy this heresy."
languages.original_text: "Через эту дверь". {n}Арджента кивает на проход справа от вас.{/n} "Я пойду с вами, ибо долг мой перед Богом-Императором — уничтожить эту ересь".

traits.locale_text: "Through this door." {n}Argenta nods at the passage to your right.{/n} "I'll go with you. I can't wait to destroy those who encroached on the God-Emperor's domain!"
"Through this door." {n}Argenta nods at the passage to your right.{/n} "I'll go with you. I can't wait to destroy those who encroached on the God-Emperor's domain!"
"Through this door." {n}Argenta nods at the passage to your right.{/n} "I shall join you, for it is my duty to the God-Emperor to destroy this heresy."

languages.text: “穿过这扇门吧。”{n}阿洁塔朝你右边的通道点了点头。{/n}“我会与你同行，因为我的职责就是消灭擅闯神皇领土的异端分子。”
languages.original_text: "Through this door." {n}Argenta nods at the passage to your right.{/n} "I shall join you, for it is my duty to the God-Emperor to destroy this heresy."

traits.locale_text: “穿过这扇门吧。”{n}阿洁塔朝你右边的通道点了点头。{/n}“我和你一起去。我已经迫不及待，渴望消灭那些擅闯神皇领土的敌人！”

languages.text: «Por esta puerta». {n}Argenta señala con la cabeza el pasaje a tu derecha.{/n} «Iré con usted, pues mi deber hacia el Dios Emperador me exige destruir esta herejía».
languages.original_text: "Through this door." {n}Argenta nods at the passage to your right.{/n} "I shall join you, for it is my duty to the God-Emperor to destroy this heresy."

traits.locale_text: «Por esta puerta». {n}Argenta señala con la cabeza el pasaje a tu derecha.{/n} «Iré con usted. ¡No deseo más que destruir a aquellos que invaden los dominios del Dios Emperador!».

languages.text: 「このドアへ」{n}アルジェンタは右側の通路に向かってうなずく。{/n}「同行します。異端を滅ぼすことが神帝陛下に対する我の義務！」
languages.original_text: "Through this door." {n}Argenta nods at the passage to your right.{/n} "I shall join you, for it is my duty to the God-Emperor to destroy this heresy."

traits.locale_text: 「このドアから」 {n}アルジェンタは右側の通路でうなずいた。{/n}「私も一緒に行きます。神帝陛下の領域を侵犯した者達を倒すのが待ちきれない！」
「このドアへ」{n}アルジェンタは右側の通路に向かってうなずく。{/n}「同行します。異端を滅ぼすことが神帝陛下に対する我の義務！」

languages.original_text: "Through this door." {n}Argenta nods at the passage to your right.{/n} "I shall join you, for it is my duty to the God-Emperor to destroy this heresy."

languages.text: {n}Du menton, Argenta indique le passage à votre droite.{/n} « Par cette porte. Je vais vous accompagner. Mon devoir envers l'Empereur-Dieu exige que j'anéantisse cette hérésie. »
languages.original_text: "Through this door." {n}Argenta nods at the passage to your right.{/n} "I shall join you, for it is my duty to the God-Emperor to destroy this heresy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du menton, Argenta indique le passage à votre droite.{/n} « Par cette porte. Je vais vous accompagner. J'ai hâte d'anéantir ceux qui ont osé envahir le domaine de l'Empereur-Dieu ! »

languages.text: "Durch diese Tür." {n}Argenta nickt in Richtung des Durchgangs zu deiner Rechten.{/n} "Ich werde Euch folgen, denn ist meine Pflicht gegenüber dem Gottimperator, diese Ketzerei zu vernichten."
languages.original_text: "Through this door." {n}Argenta nods at the passage to your right.{/n} "I shall join you, for it is my duty to the God-Emperor to destroy this heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Durch diese Tür." {n}Argenta nickt in Richtung des Durchgangs zu deiner Rechten.{/n} "Ich gehe mit Euch. Ich will alle vernichten, die das Reich des Gottimperator angegriffen haben!"

languages.text: "Bu kapıdan gideceğiz." {n}Argenta, başıyla senin sağındaki geçidi işaret ediyor.{/n} "Sizinleyim. Zira bu kâfirliğin kökünü kazımak, Tanrı İmparator'a karşı mesuliyetimdir."
languages.original_text: "Through this door." {n}Argenta nods at the passage to your right.{/n} "I shall join you, for it is my duty to the God-Emperor to destroy this heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Bu kapıdan gideceğiz." {n}Argenta, başıyla senin sağındaki geçidi işaret ediyor.{/n} "Sizinleyim. Zira bu kâfirliğin kökünü kazımak, Tanrı İmparator'a karşı mesuliyetimdir."
